title: Websites not loading
content:
I have noticed quite a few websites that will not load on Mozilla but will load on other Browsers. Even turning off enhanced tracking protection doesn't always help. Some of these sites use to load without any issues. The last one finally loaded after I turned of cookie protection completely. This was that website: https://reservations.gplakes.com/FacilityDetails.aspx?facID=4&sd=10/27/2023&ed=10/28/2023

What can I do to prevent this from happening in the future?
creator: strdrmr78

title: Moving a firefox tab  doesnt work on a different monitor  that has a chat base window open
content:
So basically when I try to move a firefox tab for example on a monitor that has discord, it doesnt move there i have to move it to the taskbar on that monitor.

IS this a bug?
creator: tankkappa

title: ActivID ActivCLient authentication alert
content:
FireFox community

Recently I started receiving Firefox alerts when I attempt to use my ActivClient CAC login See Figure _01. Entering my CAC pin into the ActivCLient dialog and everything works fine (see FIgure_02). But I can't figure out wht the alert notice is telling me or why it has started all of a sudden.

Jeff
creator: reichmaj

title: About enabling QR code in the address bar
content: I found that Firefox can automatically generate a QR code for each URL, which is a powerful and useful feature! I'd like to know if this QR code has an expiration date.
creator: jyunmo1910

title: Pls help me! Recently closed button disapeared
content: There is an option to reopen recently closed tabs (the button shown in the attached image), but it's gone and I need it. How can I reactivate? Does this have something to do with about:config?

title: YouTube thinks I have a ad blocker....I don't
content: Can't play you tube videos because it says I have ad blocker
creator: gelewis

title: How to make Firefox 83.0 support private fields?
content:
Hello, I am using firefox 83.0 and I don't want to update it (Why? Because I've an old PC with poor hardware and the playback of online videos is lagging/shuttering in releases after 83.0)

BUT firefox 83.0 doesn't support private fields which make some webpages unable to be loaded. the private fields was supported starting in release 90.0 and I'm using 83.0

So, I need a way to make firefox 83.0 support private fields, Is that possible? Is there a certain files should I edited or replaced to make it support private fields?

Any ideas would be appreciated.
creator: mydreamm17
